author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This is a follow-up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36142:
   * clean-up unused methods
   * add `fillDescriptions`  method
   * introduce unit tests to read / write payload of the type `AlignPCLThresholds`

#### PR validation:

Relies on the augmented unit tests.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: update `AlignPCLThresholdsWriter` and add unit tests
